4316760.name: Set In Stone
4316760.description:
Play with friends. Use big rock. Guard fire. Get sap. Big sap fuel fire. Go out, find plant. Plant guard fire. Evolve. Get tools. Set in Stone is a Co-op survival wave shooter about defending your bonfire from waves of dinosaurs. Do you and your friends have what it takes to survive?

USE SAP

Get sap from special trees! Sap acts as your shield, the fuel to your fires, and unlocks new areas of the map. 

FIGHT DINOSAURS

Velociraptors target your sources of light, trying to snuff them out. If your bonfire goes out, your teammates can’t respawn, plants no longer grow, and sap no longer regenerates.

EXPAND YOUR TERRITORY

Break down cave walls and light torches in new rooms to light up the cave and push the velociraptors back. 

EVOLVE

Find and melt crystal shards to unlock upgrades to speed, sap capacity, and more! Certain crystals grant your team advancements, which allows you to unlock tools and special abilities! 

FORAGE

Discover plants that can be used to defend your base, build walls, set off explosions, and prank your friends!
4316760.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
